content: boney frank s pet sweater advanced beginner/intermediate this sweater was designed to keep my 18 1/2 year old boney frank warm it has ease stretch and will fit the average to chubby cat or any other similar sized pet size 9 double point needles or what s needed for gauge gauge - 17 sts/ 23 row/4 inches - stockinette approximately 2 - 2 1/2 oz worsted or aran weight yarn 14 total length 16 circumference at widest point cast on 42 sts joining in the round k1p1 for 1 1/2 inches switch to stockinette stitch knit 4 rounds arrange sts on needles needle 1 - 24 sts 24 sts will remain on needle 1 till the end of project needle 2 - 9 sts needle 3 - 9 sts neck row a - needle 1 - knit needle 2 - knit until the last stitch kfb needle 3 - kfb in first stitch knit to end row b - knit repeat row a and row b stitch count - 24/11/11 front leg openings using only the 24 sts from needle 1 knitting flat knit right side and purl wrong side stockinette till this piece is 6 inches from cast on edge end with right side facing you do not cut yarn if you want to use a different color for belly of the sweater you ll have a smoother transition when joining in the round later if using just one color yarn cut here and then attach at needle 2 using only needles 2 and 3 knitting flat attach desired yarn at needle 2 right end right side facing row a - needle 2 - knit till last stitch kfb needle 3 - kfb in first stitch then knit to the end turn work row b - purl to end of row work needles 2 and 3 row a and b till there are 20 sts on each needle ending with right side facing you body cut contrasting yarn if used knitting in the round start with needle 1 and knit joining in the round as you go 24/20/20 sts knit till piece measures 4 inches from end of leg openings completing that row if you re concerned about having enough yarn or want a shorter sweater knit fewer than 4 inches allowing for 3 1/2 inches at bottom of sweater for decreases and ribbing page 2 decrease at sides needle 1- knit k2tog at the end of needle 2 turn work knitting flat again p2tog then purl across to the last 2 stitches on needle 3 p2tog turn work a - k2tog and knit across needles 3 1 and 2 k2tog in the last two stitches turn work b - p2tog and purl across needles 2 1 and 3 p2tog in the last two stitches turn work repeat row a and b till there is 1 stitch left on needle 2 slip the one stitch onto needle 1 needles 2 and 3 have no sts needle 1 should now
